** {{nbt|int|minecraft:max_damage}}: The maximum amount of damage that this item can take. If not set, this item cannot take damage. Must be a non-zero positive integer. Cannot be combined with <code>[[Data component format#max stack size|minecraft:max_stack_size]]</code> if it has a value greater than 1 (if the item can be stacked). For the durability bar to appear, the damage component must have a value. Example <code>damage=0</code>.<!-- --></onlyinclude>
